"Zeno":
"Whew. I guess that's about it,
<%me>. Thanks."

"When you lose your cool, it can feel good to
rush headlong into the fray. But it's better
not to do it alone."

"My mentor always told me that having a
cool-headed partner with you helps keep
you from getting in too deep."

"I wonder how many times that advice has
saved me..."

"But there's no point blabbing to you about old
stuff. We've achieved our objective,
so let's head back."
